about_the_game:
Find your missing daughter

This game is a story-driven, atmospheric horror experience where your main objective is to find your missing daughter, Clare, in a hospital. As you progress, you’ll uncover Clare’s whereabouts and the dark secrets of what happened in the hospital.

Collect Items

In this game, you will need to collect various items such as batteries, ammo, weapons, keys, puzzle parts, and more.

Fight Enemies

You will have to fight some enemies from the hospital to progress. This is why you should search the hospital for ammo and weapons.

Avoid the Doctor

There’s one thing in this game you can’t shoot or destroy, the Doctor himself. Or can you? You’ll have to find out..

Solve puzzles

In this game, to proceed, you will need to find items (like keys) and solve logic puzzles.

Publishing plans

We plan to release a demo this year (2024) and the full game next year (2025).

About us

This game is created by two game developers from Hungary. Driven by passion, we dedicated our free time after long workdays to bring this project to life. If you are interested in the game, you can support us by adding it to your wishlist.

We hope you will enjoy the game!

content_descriptors.notes: Be aware of scary moments, assault, blood, corps.

name: 7th Floor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-9400F or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (1080p 60FPS) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Find your missing daughter in the Hospital of Madness. Collect items, fight enemies, and do whatever it takes to reach her!
supported_languages:
English*, Hungarian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
